channel.title: CVE Feed for DearHive -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DearHive -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0895|2024-08-01T18:18:18.989Z -- dearhive -- pdf%20flipbook%2C%203d%20flipbook%20%E2%80%93%20dearflip
item.description: The PDF Flipbook, 3D Flipbook â€“ DearFlip plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via outline settings in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.26 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied data. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-29807|2024-06-04T17:57:16.068Z -- dearhive -- dearflip
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in DearHive DearFlip allows Stored XSS.This issue affects DearFlip: from n/a through 2.2.26.
